title: Highly Uniform Platinum Photodeposited Hollow Mesoporous Titania Nanoparticles for Photocatalytic Degradation of Phenol
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00156G, Paper
KUDAIBERGEN DAULETKEREY, Geun Young Kim, Hyun-Seok Choe, Jeong-Min Park, Hangil Kim, Donghyun Lee, Heewoo Jeon, Changha Lee, Jaehyuk Kim
Photocatalysis is an essential and cost-effective method for efficient disinfection and profound detoxification of organic wastes from wastewater. In this study, we fabricated an unprecedented facile Pt photodeposited crystalline hollow...
